snippet.title: Subspace (Continuum) VIE Opening
snippet.description: This is the opening movie to Subspace, one of the first truly massively multiplayer online games (1997).  After the game was discontinued by Virgin Interactive Entertainment, it found new life as a free game known as Continuum.  It continues to be a popular free game, supported 100% by the gaming community.
